languages.text: "Старик умер в крови по колено, в попытке прикончить самого близкого человека. Я-то думала, так умирают съехавшие с катушек псайкеры, а оно и вот так бывает".

traits.locale_text: "Смотрю, у всех были видения во время того боя. А вот я сражалась с... Нет, лучше вам этого не знать".

languages.text: "The old man went out knee-deep in blood and trying to kill the person dearest to him. I thought only deranged psykers died this way, but here we are."
languages.original_text: "Старик умер в крови по колено, в попытке прикончить самого близкого человека. Я-то думала, так умирают съехавшие с катушек псайкеры, а оно и вот так бывает".

traits.locale_text: "The old man died knee-deep in blood and trying to kill the person dearest to him. I thought only deranged psykers died this way, but here we are."
"The old man died knee-deep in blood and trying to kill the person dearest to him. I thought only deranged psykers died this way, but here we are."
"The old man went out knee-deep in blood and trying to kill the person dearest to him. I thought only deranged psykers died this way, but here we are."
"The old man went out knee-deep in blood and trying to kill the person dearest to him. I thought only deranged psykers died this way, but here we are."
"The old man went out knee-deep in blood and trying to kill the person dearest to him. I thought only deranged psykers died this way, but here we are."
"The old man went out knee-deep in blood and trying to kill the person dearest to him. I thought only deranged psykers died this way, but here we are."
"The old man went out knee-deep in blood and trying to kill the person dearest to him. I thought only deranged psykers died this way, but here we are."

languages.text: «El anciano ha muerto hasta las rodillas de sangre e intentando matar a la persona a la que más quería. Pensaba que solo los psíquicos dementes morían así, pero aquí estamos».
languages.original_text: "The old man went out knee-deep in blood and trying to kill the person dearest to him. I thought only deranged psykers died this way, but here we are."

languages.text: 「その老人は膝まで血に浸かって、親しい人を殺そうとしたの。こんな死に方をするのは錯乱した異能者だけだと思ってたけど、他にもいたとはね」
languages.original_text: "The old man went out knee-deep in blood and trying to kill the person dearest to him. I thought only deranged psykers died this way, but here we are."

languages.text: “那个老人浑身上下都沾满了血，打算杀死他最珍爱的人。我原本以为只有陷入疯狂的灵能者才会死得这么惨，但现在我算是明白了。”
languages.original_text: "The old man went out knee-deep in blood and trying to kill the person dearest to him. I thought only deranged psykers died this way, but here we are."

languages.text: "Der alte Mann ist durch knietiefes Blut gewatet, um die Person zu töten, die ihm am teuersten war. Ich dachte nur derangierte Psioniker sterben auf diese Weise, aber hier sind wir nun."
languages.original_text: "The old man went out knee-deep in blood and trying to kill the person dearest to him. I thought only deranged psykers died this way, but here we are."

languages.text: « Le vieillard s'est enfoncé jusqu'aux genoux dans le sang et a tenté de tuer la personne qui lui était la plus chère. Moi qui croyais que seuls les psykers déments mouraient comme ça… »
languages.original_text: "The old man went out knee-deep in blood and trying to kill the person dearest to him. I thought only deranged psykers died this way, but here we are."
"The old man went out knee-deep in blood and trying to kill the person dearest to him. I thought only deranged psykers died this way, but here we are."

languages.text: "İhtiyar adam, en kıymet verdiği kişiyi öldürmeye çalışarak dizlerine kadar kana bulandı. Yalnızca dengesiz ruhsezerler bu şekilde ölür sanardım ama her şey ortada."
languages.original_text: "The old man went out knee-deep in blood and trying to kill the person dearest to him. I thought only deranged psykers died this way, but here we are."
